      • getActivitiesByStatement

        ActivityPage getActivitiesByStatement(Statement filterStatement)
                                      throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                                             ApiException
        Gets an ActivityPage of Activity objects that satisfy the given Statement.query. The following fields are supported for filtering:
        id Activity.id
        name Activity.name
        expectedURL Activity.expectedURL
        status Activity.status
        activityGroupId Activity.activityGroupId

        Note: activityGroupId is required in the statement.

        Parameters:
        filterStatement - a statement used to filter a set of activities.
        Returns:
        the activities that match the given filter.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        ApiException

      • getActivity

        Activity getActivity(java.lang.Integer activityId)
                     throws java.rmi.RemoteException,
                            ApiException
        Returns the Activity uniquely identified by the given ID.
        Parameters:
        activityId - the ID of the activity, which must already exist
        Returns:
        the Activity uniquely identified by the given ID
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
        ApiException
